params.positionManager: the address of the position manager which recieved the position

params.amount0Desired: the amount of the first token to be deposited
params.amount1Desired: the amount of the second token to be deposited
params.fee: fee tier of the pool to be deposited in
params.tickLower: the lower bound of the position range
params.tickUpper: the upper bound of the position range
params.token0: the first token to be deposited
params.token1: the second token to be deposited

returns.tokenId: the ID of the minted NFT

PositionDeposited(address,address,uint25.notice: emitted when a position is created

depositUniNft(uint256[]).notice: add uniswap position NFT to the position manager

mintAndDeposit(address,address,uint24,in.notice: mint uniswapV3 NFT and deposit in the position manager

zapInUniNft(address,uint256,address,addr.notice: mints a uni NFT with a single input token, the token in input can be different from the two position tokens

userdoc.notice: DepositRecipes allows user to fill their position manager with UniswapV3 positions        by depositing an already minted NFT or by minting directly a new one
